name: Simple Arkanoit
description:
A simple Arkanoid style game. 
This game is a practice that I did following a series of tutorials from LuisCanary channel, with some modifications of my own.  
Visit his channel: 
https://www.youtube.com/c/LuisCanary  
I appreciate the time you spend on your videos and how well explained they are. 
If you want I can share the project files.
